Name: Extra HP
Description: Grants +10 HP

Name: Extra SP
Description: Grants +10 SP

Name: Even more HP
Description: Grants +20 HP

Name: Even more SP
Description: Grants +20 SP

Name: Most HP
Description: Grants +30 HP

Name: Most SP
Description: Grants +30 SP

Name: Better Heavy Attacks
Description: All Heavy Attacks do +8 Damage

Name: Longer DOT
Description: All Damage Over Time effects last 2 turns longer

Name: Stronger DOT
Description: All Damage Over Time +5% damage per turn

Name: Shop Discount
Description: 20% Discount on all shop purchases

Name: Sales Person
Description: 20% increase in the sell price of items

Name: Better Luck
Description: Boosts the power of the Rewards Spin

Name: Super Luck
Description: Boosts the power of the Rewards Spin more

Name: Godly Luck
Description: Boosts the power of the Rewards Spin even more

Name: Better Rest
Description: Resting generates more SP and gives a damage reduction effect

Name: Super Rest
Description: Resting generates even more SP and and a stronger damage reduction effect

Name: Looting
Description: In the rewards Spin you are much more likely to pull the loot effect

Name: Armor Specialist
Description: Armor provides +3 Defense and Robes provide +5 Magical damage

Name: Armor Polish
Description: Armor provides +5 Defense and +3 Defense Piercing. Robes provide +2 Defense and +5 Magical damage.

Name: Dyssynergy
Description: Having a physical and magical weapon equiped provides +5 Damage and -5 SP cost

Name: Physical Specialty
Description: Grants accsess to more physical skills

Name: Physical Set Bonus
Description: Wearing Armor with two physical weapons grants +2 Defense and +2 Physical Damage

Name: Sword Fan
Description: Grants +3 Swords Damage and -3 SP on light sword attacks

Name: Sword Master
Description: Grants +20% Damage on Swords and -7 SP on heavy sword attacks

Name: Not a Sword?
Description: Grants +4 Damage, +10% Damage, and -4 SP for Not Sword physical weapons

Name: Sturdier Sheilds
Description: Increases the efficacy of Shields blocking and bashing

Name: Efficient Light Physical
Description: Grants -4 SP for Light Attacks on physical weapons

Name: Efficient Physical
Description: Grants -6 SP on all Attacks on physical weapons

Name: Magical Specialty
Description: Grants accsess to more magical skill

Name: Magical Set Bonus
Description: Wearing Robes and equiping 2 magical weapons grants +4 magical damage and -4 magical SP cost

Name: Warlock
Description: Staffs get +4 Magical Damage

Name: Warlock Prowess
Description: Staffs get +30% Damage and -4 SP cost

Name: Reading Proficency
Description: Tomes get -30% SP cost

Name: Archaeologist
Description: Relics do and additional 5% Damage and -6 SP cost

Name: Efficient Light Magical
Description: Light Magic attacks get -4 SP cost

Name: Efficient Magical
Description: All magical attacks get -6 SP cost

Name: Armorless
Description: Grants +5 Damage when not wearing armor, and lets you equip an accessory in the armor slot

Name: Deep Mastery
Description: Grants accsess to more powerful and expensive skills

Name: Omni-Boost
Description: Grants a small buff to all stats

Name: Extra Option
Description: Grants an extra option in the rewards spin

Name: RE-Curb
Description: Decreases the effect levels have on enemy attacks

Name: Extra Accessory Slot
Description: Grants and extra accessory slot

Name: Accessory Power up
Description: Increases the power of all accessories
